TopicTitle: [WIP], [PART], [0.20] Hyphen Aeronautical Construction v0.3B. Please check! :D

Articles.Content:
A branch of Hyphen Aeronautics, we construct things so you can fly at ease. This thread contains all future and current products, as well as other information about this project.

Hyphen Aeronautical Construction,

a branch of

Hyphen Aeronautics.

-building planes and a better Kerbin-

NOTE: THIS IS NOT A CRAFT FILE SHOWCASE. PLEASE CLICK THE LINK IN MY SIGNATURE FOR A SHORTCUT TO THE HYPHEN AERONAUTICS RELEASE THREAD. THIS IS A THREAD OF THE MODDING BRANCH OF HYPHEN AERONAUTICS, HYPHEN AERONAUTICAL CONSTRUCTION.

PLEASE tell me what you think!

PRODUCTS

Radial RTG:

Mount it on any surface it'll stick to. Its spherical shape makes it much easier to mount, opposed to the traditional RTG.

This product is in CLOSED BETA. Only BETA TESTERS may use this PRODUCT, and they will be sent a LINK via PRIVATE MESSAGE to DOWNLOAD this PRODUCT.

Please send me a PM if you'd like to be a beta Tester.

Note that this product IS playable, but it is being improved.\

THIS PART WILL CLIP INTO THE PART IT IS ATTACHED TO HALFWAY. THIS IS INTENTIONAL. WHO WANTS RANDOM ISOSPHERIC CASES STICKING OUT OF YOUR PROBES? AGAIN, THIS IS INTENTIONAL. A VIDEO MAY BE UPLOADED SOON SHOWING HOW THIS PART SHOULD BE USED.

Known issues and changelog:


changelog-
v0.1B:
-Added image of RRTG
v0.2B:
-Changed model to simpler shapes to improve speed
v0.3B:
-Fixed issue causing colliders not working.
-Beta testers now testing. Beta testers: I.R.L.
-New textures, added "scratchy" look, similar to Stratus V monopropellant tank.
-Changed texture format to PNG from MBM.
-Fixed component errors in Unity (PartTools script options not working)
-----------------------------------------------------------
issues and bugs-

-textures not working.

sweet keep up the awesomeness and put something out
Thanks for the opinion. I now have I.R.L. doing beta testing for this mod. Should be out soon, there's just a bad bug where the part won't collide.
Note: Updated to v0.3B, Beta Tester I.R.L. will test soon!
